Posts.Content: Hello my love. please please do not worry.  There is no breast cancer in my family and yet,I am having my right breast removed tomorrow,! i have been widowed for two years now,there is just my daughter and me but,I am thinking positive,my right breast is,not my life! good luck to you,I will be thinking of you tomorrow when I have my op.  You will meet very sympathetic nurses & other medical staff thet really do understand what you are going through.  You can tell them anything ! All the best Maureen
Posts.Title: Lumpy area and sore armpit
